edu.uml.cs.isense.waffle
Class Waffle

java.lang.Object
  edu.uml.cs.isense.waffle.Waffle

public class Waffle
extends java.lang.Object

Class that creates custom-styled, visually-pleasing Toast messages, given a particular set of user parameters. Waffles will not be queued infinitesimally, unlike their Toast counterpart. This prevents the flooding the Toast messages on an Android device. As a result, however, any Waffle message that attempts to be displayed whilst another Waffle is displaying will cause the older Waffle message to be dismissed. Some constants in this class are of type short or long when they could be integers. Using shorts/longs enables the ability to have 8 separate, similarly named "make" functions that enable full-user control over his or her custom Waffle message.

Field Summary
 boolean canPerformTask
          Optional boolean feature included that implements the ability to perform a particular task within 1.5 seconds of a particular Waffle message being displayed.
 Context context
          Context that this Waffle message will be displayed on.
static short IMAGE_CHECK
          ID for a green "check" image to be displayed on a Waffle message.
static short IMAGE_WARN
          ID for a yellow "warning" image to be displayed on a Waffle message.
static short IMAGE_X
          ID for a red "x" image to be displayed on a Waffle message.
 boolean isDisplaying
          Boolean trigger that informs whether or not a Waffle message is currently being displayed.
static long LENGTH_LONG
          Long-length constant for Waffle messages (equivalent to Toast.LENGTH_LONG).
static long LENGTH_SHORT
          Short-length constant for Waffle messages (equivalent to Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).

          Default constructor for the Waffle object.

Constructor Detail

Waffle

public Waffle(Context c)
Default constructor for the Waffle object.

Parameters:
c - Context required to display Waffle messages on the context's view.
Method Detail

make

Display a custom-styled Toast message for a specified duration, equipped
 with a "check" or "x" image and a custom background drawable.





Parameters:
message - Message to display in the view.
length - Duration of the message (Waffle.LENGTH_SHORT or
            Waffle.LENGTH_LONG).
image_id - ID of the image to display in the view (Waffle.IMAGE_CHECK,
            Waffle.IMAGE_X, or Waffle.IMAGE_WARN).
background_id - Resource ID of the background drawable to be used as the
            background of the Waffle message (e.g. R.drawable.my_background).
